bigquery.description: Create DV360 report cohorts, ADD TEST ADVERTISERS HERE.

from.query:
SELECT
             STRUCT(
               STRUCT(
                 'LAST_7_DAYS' AS `range`
               ) AS `dataRange`,
               'CSV' AS `format`,
               false AS `sendNotification`,
               FORMAT('BQFlow Report Test - %d', cohort) AS `title`
             ) AS `metadata`,
             STRUCT (
                 ARRAY(
                  SELECT AS STRUCT
                    'FILTER_PARTNER' AS `type`,
                    advertiserId AS `value`
                  FROM UNNEST(advertiserIds) AS advertiserId
                ) AS `filters`,
               ['FILTER_ADVERTISER'] AS `groupBys`,
               ['METRIC_IMPRESSIONS'] AS `metrics`,
               'STANDARD' AS `type`
             ) AS `params`,
             STRUCT(
               'ONE_TIME' AS `frequency`
             ) AS `schedule`
           FROM (
             SELECT
               cohort,
               ARRAY_AGG(advertiserId) AS advertiserIds,
             FROM (
               SELECT
                 advertiserId,
                 MOD(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY advertiserId ASC), 3) + 1
                 AS cohort
               FROM UNNEST(
                 ['234340', '234340', '6778100135', '6764191627', '673070109']
               ) AS advertiserId
             )
             GROUP BY cohort
           )
           ORDER BY cohort
